text: لَقَدْ جِئْنَـٰكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَكُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ

translation.en.sahih: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Kami benar-benar telah memhawa kebenaran kepada kamu tetapi kebanyakan di antara kamu benci pada kebenaran itu.
